title: Target .NETCoreApp1.0 for MSBuild on .NET Core
body:
We're currently target .NETStandard1.5 for MSBuild.exe.  We'll need to do the follow instead:
- [x] Update project.json to target `netcoreapp1.0`
- [x] Manually generate an `MSBuild.runtimeconfig.json` for now.
- [x] Update the `Microsoft.Build.Runtime` package
- [x] Output as `MSBuild.dll` instead of `MSBuild.exe`
